question: Is it permissible for a girl to do aerobics or to dance on a national songs ?
answer:
QUESTION
In which no vulgar or sexual language or wording is being used only in front of Muslim females while her body is fully and properly covered . As I have read that our Prophet (P.B.U.H.) permits to sing and enjoy on special occasions like Eid etc. So please clarify that to me . Jazakallahu Khairun
ANSWER


Share:
It is certainly permissible, in fact, desirable to express happiness on
happy occasions like Eid, etc. However, the expressions must be within the
limits of Shari'ah.

Dancing is a salient custom of the Kuffaar to express happiness. Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Whosoever imitates a nation is among
them.' Furthermore, in the context of a female, in dancing, the form and
shape of the body is revealed which is against the spirit of modesty and
shame and Hijaab.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
